title: Tenshoku no Shinden wo Hirakimashita
original_name: 転職の神殿を開きました
sinopse: For people born as villagers, no matter how hard they work, they cannot change their status as a villager, nor there is any way for them to become swordsmen. This is a world where peoples' lives are determined by what "job" they are assigned at birth. And it is to this world, that one young man gifted with a certain ability, was summoned. The ability given to Kaname Morimoto, was "job change."
